success_criteria: <b> <i> or <font> tag should not be used

error_fixes.problem_type: Inline styles should be avoided

error_fixes.problem_type: Need to remove <b> tag
Font or B tag used

error_fixes.fixed_line: <strong> <em> or CSS should be used instead for styling

error_fixes.problem_type: Font tag used in the code

success_criteria: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
error_fixes.offending_line: <button onclick="generateResume()" style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(76, 175, 80);">Generate Resume</button>
error_fixes.fixed_line: <button onclick="generateResume()" onkeydown="if(event.key === 'Enter') { generateResume() }" style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(76, 175, 80);">Generate Resume</button>

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible

success_criteria: meta refresh with a time-out is used.

error_fixes.problem_type: Meta refresh used with a time-out

error_fixes.problem_type: Marquee element used
